testcase.name: Digital pulse home page
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the PwC Digital Pulse website...........................passed When User opens URL "https://www.pwc.com.au/digitalpulse.html"..............passed When I am viewing the Home page.............................................passed Then I am presented with 3 columns of articles..............................passed And The left column is displaying 2 articles................................passed And The middle column is displaying 1 articles..............................passed And The right column is displaying 4 articles...............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Digital pulse subscription
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the PwC Digital Pulse website...........................passed When User opens URL "https://www.pwc.com.au/digitalpulse.html"..............passed And I am viewing the Home page..............................................passed When I click on the Subscribe navigation link...............................passed Then I am taken to the Subscribe page.......................................passed And I am presented with the below fields....................................passed And close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Digital pulse magnifying glass
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the PwC Digital Pulse website...........................passed When User opens URL "https://www.pwc.com.au/digitalpulse.html"..............passed When I click on the Magnifying glass icon to perform a search...............passed And I enter the text 'Single page applications'.............................passed Then I am taken to the search results page..................................passed And I am presented with at least 1 search result............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
